raux.description: RAUX is AMD's UI for interacting with AI models, forked from Open-WebUI

key_features.interface: Modern chat interface similar to ChatGPT
key_features.integration: Can be installed alongside GAIA but operates independently

installation.location: Installed separately from main GAIA application

gaia_installer.description: Can be installed as optional component during GAIA installation
gaia_installer.default: Enabled by default in GAIA installer

python_script.description: Can be installed via raux_installer.py script
